attributes.action: ban credit rating agencies from giving credit ratings to people it has no knowledge of their bank or credit card details and who have not defaulted on any payments.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The banks do not communicate with all the credit-rating agencies. The credit- rating agencies do not communicate with each other. You may therefore have a bank account with Natwest which Experian will know nothing about. But Experian will give you a credit-rating. This should be illegal - such a rating is supersition rather than based on fact. In such an instance Experian should say 'no knowledge use other agency' rather than give an inaccurate and possibly detrimental answer
